projectsData.title: Quantum Meet
projectsData.description: QuantumMeet is an AI-powered SaaS platform where users can create agents, host meetings, and instantly access AI-generated summary , transcript , recodings , chat

projectsData.title: While(1)
projectsData.description: This platform promotes social learning by supporting three types of users: beginners, intermediates, and mentors. Beginners can explore and learn new technologies, intermediates can swap skills through real-time chat using Socket.IO, and mentors serve as guides. Users can send mentor requests via email, and once accepted, theyâ€™re added to one-on-one chats. The platform also offers tech courses, interview prep resources, and a resume builder.

projectsData.title: ByteBank
projectsData.description: A wallet app that tracks multi-currency transactions, including sending and receiving crypto.

projectsData.title: Food Render
projectsData.description: A food platform similar to Swiggy. Users can add items to the cart. Built using React and Redux Store for state management.

projectsData.title: My Portfolio
projectsData.description: My personal portfolio showcasing my education, skills, and a built-in assistant.

projectsData.title: Netflix GPT
projectsData.description: A Netflix clone with JWT authentication and GPT integration for movie recommendations.

projectsData.title: Expiry Alert
projectsData.description: A React Native app to track expiry dates of goods. Users can add product details manually through a form or automatically using camera-based OCR. The app notifies users before the items expire

projectsData.title: GramRozgaar
projectsData.description: GramRozgaar is a bilingual (Hindi/English) employment app designed to empower villagers by connecting them with local job opportunities. The app features both light and dark modes and provides detailed profiles of workers and available machinery. Users can view nearby workers on an interactive map for easy access and hiring.
